document.full_text: former president jimmy carter will begin a three-day visit to cuba on monday for what is described as a "private, non-governmental mission" where the main topic may be the fate of a u.s. aid contractor jailed for setting up illegal internet service.
document.title: jailed u.s. man likely focus of carter cuba trip
lines_and_colors: former president jimmy carter will begin a three-day visit to cuba on monday for what is described as a "private, non-governmental mission" where the main topic may be the fate of a u.s. aid contractor jailed for setting up illegal internet service.
